title: (x) Hazlitz Bespoke Stationery striped sans - Prisma (Mirage) {Michael Albright (Rainer)}
content:
Perhaps this is a "Bespoke Font" but does anyone recognise it?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [a\_id\_1.2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20121118001809/http:/typophile.com/files/a_id_1.2.jpg) | 32.22 KB |
author: acejet170

comments.content:
Or [Mirage](http://web.archive.org/web/20121118001809/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=38121)

EDIT: Yepp, michael albright said it …
That's great, thanks! Can't find the version called Mirage but have found Prisma. Perfect.

Dave Noe gave the right link for [George W Williams Mirage-version](http://web.archive.org/web/20121118001809/http:/freefonts.fateback.com/george_williams/), but don't know about the legibility of both fonts.
The George W Williams Mirage font is very poorly digitised...
